subproject.description: The main functions of each centre will be: i) analyze and follow up the local governance conditions for MDG achievement, ii) publicize information and provide scenarios for citizens debate, iii) identify strategic areas of intervention and facilitate dialogue among sub national governments and other local actors, and iv) provide feedback to a regional node on the tools and methodologies used. The regional node will articulate the local centers, and will promote partnerships to establish the local centers, create synergies among them and with other relevant development actors and initiatives within and outside the UN System, further develop common knowledge tools on local governance for the MDGs, and monitor the activities carried out by local centers.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Local Gov. conditions for MDG

subproject.description: Transition from the provision of technical services on citizens' security and civic culture to knowledge management for citizens' security advisory services, achieved (thematic phasing-out strategy).
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: management and operations

title: Regional Project on Local Governance in LAC
